item.title: How to read and forward Trading view Alerts to sms using google scripts
item.description:
Introduction

In the previous article, we proposed a method to create alerts on trading view, recieve these alerts by email, tag these alerts with a label and forward these alerts to our mobile phone by MMS. In this article we show a special case of a mobile operator (Free Mobile …

item.title: How to get Trading view Alerts by sms for free
item.description:
Introduction

This will be the first post in our new blog! Today i am going to show how we can recieve alerts created on Trading view by sms directly on your mobile phone for free. At the time of this writing, trading view only sends email and email-to-sms alerts for …
